definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: abundance, quantity;—appar. abs. [[שִׁפְעַת]] 2Ki 9:17, a multitude (of men), (Bur [[שִׁפְעָה]], or [[שִׁפְעַת אֲנׇשִׁים]] as Klo Benz al.; > LXX:B Kit [[עָפָר]]); cstr. [[שִׁפְעַת יֵהוּא]] v:2Ki 9:17 Jehu’s multitude; cstr., of horses Ez Eze 26:10, camels Is 60:6; of waters Job 22:11, Job 38:34.
